name: Mechanized-Wargear-Catalogue Deer Edition
author: Shamus & ThatOddDeer
description: 40 new mechs and 24 Core bonuses across the 4 core manufacturers, plus 13 alternate Talents and new talents to come. Shamus: Fluff Author, Idea Man. ThatOddDeer: Balance Technician, Co-Idea Man. Ikiryo: Alternate Talent Author. Special thanks to LWA for concept pitches and Arwen and Ivoro for all the coding you've done! Arwen: I love Beef, but fuck the Beefpocalypse. (Arwen did the new port)
